properties.name: VMware Cloud Web Security - Policy Change Detected
properties.description: This Analytics rule provides notifications when a VMware CWS policy has been modified. These alerts serve audit purposes. Policy changes might lower the level of security controls.
properties.query:
VMware_VECO_EventLogs_CL
| where event == "CWS_EVENT"
| extend cwsPolicyAction = todynamic(detail).subEvent
| where cwsPolicyAction contains "SECURITY_RULE"
| extend cwsRuleName = todynamic(detail).name
| extend cwsRuleType = todynamic(detail).data.ruleType
| extend cwsPolicyName = todynamic(detail).policyName
